name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the platform. This is used to identify the platform in Homebridge.

serviceType.title: Service Type
serviceType.description: The type of service to create for the device. This can be 'HeaterCooler'

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: The platform name for the plugin. This should match 'ESP8266 IR MQTT'.

UniqueId.title: Unique ID
UniqueId.description: Unique ID for the device. This is used to identify the device in Homebridge.

displayName.title: Display Name
displayName.description: Name of the device as it will appear in Homebridge.

server.title: Server
server.description: MQTT server address. This is usually in the format 'hostname:port'.

username.title: MQTT username
username.description: Username for MQTT authentication. Leave empty if not required.

password.title: MQTT Password
password.description: Password for MQTT authentication. Leave empty if not required.

prefix.title: Service Prefix
prefix.description: Prefix for MQTT topics. This is used to identify the device in MQTT messages.
